title: Legacy
description: Legacy - book six of Royal Blood Chronicles continues Katrina's journey as leader of the Five, and the Protectors. If there is any way to convince the spirit of Elysewin to release Cain, Katrina is going to find it. The thought of him imprisoned in its roots because of her, is too much to bear. Elsewhere, Vampire Royal rule is being challenged and Katrina's world is torn apart by more than one loss. Devastated by betrayal so close to her, Katrina now questions everything in her life, and the tension between Quinn and Damien comes to a head after a secret is revealed that will change all of their lives forever.Once again, Elizabeth Loraine takes us on a new journey with the Five Protectors, although this 6th installment takes a brand new turn with a new generation of characters to love. Exciting, non-stop adventure awaits as Legacy takes you on yet another incredible ride through the Royal Blood Chronicle's world, leaving you yearning impatiently for more! P.C. Buck
author: Elizabeth Loraine
